description:
The toughest boss has been decided, but Yamaguchi won`t accept it--that is, until he sees who it is. Afterwards, Takenouchi and Hayashida exchange secrets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment le championnat des boss de lycée eut lieu
Shooting Star Press / Get It On
